name: Good Cube, Bad Cube
description:
Description: This is a game where you play as a cube and have to protect yourself from getting pushed off your pedestal by hostile cubes. But beware, what goes around comes around... 

Resources: (sounds and font for game)

Freesound: 

Yell EEEH | RETRO_PEW_SHOT_1 | Game_over | Hit_03

Royalty Free Bg Music: 

A Fresh Thought  

222 Free Fonts: 

FFF Forward

Note: This is my first game jam submission. Honest feedback is much appreciated and very helpful to me.
